title: The Fight continues
creator_credit: Vaclav Bedrich, Czechoslovak Film and World Health Organisation
brief_description: This short animated film describes briefly the aims and work of the World Health Organisation: to fight disease and help give to every human being their fundamental right to the highest attainable standard of health.
